languages.text: Инквизитор направил все усилия на создание тайной полиции, посредством которой он скрытно управлял важнейшими фигурами Простора. Он наводил ужас на каждого губернатора и наместника региона. Со временем методы Хейнрикса перешли грань дозволенного: впав в радикализм, Инквизитор начал полагаться на инструменты ксеносов и даже Хаоса в слежке и управлении людьми. Объединенное восстание Имперского флота и Футфола положило конец его тирании, однако свергнутый и загнанный в угол еретик обрушил на головы своих врагов запретные силы, унеся с собой в могилу сотни невинных.

The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.
languages.original_text: Инквизитор направил все усилия на создание тайной полиции, посредством которой он скрытно управлял важнейшими фигурами Простора. Объединенное восстание Имперского флота и Футфола положило конец его тирании, однако свергнутый и загнанный в угол еретик обрушил на головы своих врагов запретные силы, унеся с собой в могилу сотни невинных.

traits.locale_text: The Inquisitor poured all his effort into the creation of the secret police, which he used to stealthily control the most influential figures of the Expanse. He terrified every governor and liege of the region. As time passed, Heinrix's started to cross the line with his methods: using the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joined rebellion of the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, yet cast down and cornered, the heretic brought the forbidden powers down on the heads of his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

The Inquisitor poured all his effort into the creation of the secret police, which he used to stealthily control the most influential figures of the Expanse. He terrified every governor and liege of the region. As time passed, Heinrix's started to cross the line with his methods: using the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joined rebellion of the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, yet cast down and cornered, the heretic brought the forbidden powers down on the heads of his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures of the Expanse. He terrified every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Falling to radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. The combined mutiny of the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear on his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

languages.text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官将所有的精力用来创建秘密警察制度，在暗中控制着科罗努斯扩区中最有影响力的人物，将恐惧植入了所有总督与统治者心中。然而，随着时间的流逝，海因里希的手段变得越来越极端，最终倒向了激进派，使用异形的造物乃至混沌的工具来监视、操纵人们。帝国海军和落脚港联合发动了兵变，结束了他的暴政。然而，当海因里希意识到自己走投无路时，这个异端分子将禁忌的力量倾泻在了他的敌人头上，拉上了几百名无辜之人与他一同赴死。
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

traits.locale_text: 冯·卡洛克斯审判官将所有的精力用来创建秘密警察制度，在暗中控制着科罗努斯扩区中最有影响力的人物，恐吓了所有的总督与统治者。然而，随着时间的流逝，海因里希的手段变得越来越极端，最终倒向了激进派，使用异形的造物乃至混沌的工具来监视、操纵人们。帝国海军和落脚港联合发动了兵变，结束了他的暴政。然而，在海因里希意识到自己走投无路之后，这个异端分子将禁忌的力量倾泻在了他的敌人头上，拉上了几百名无辜之人与他一同赴死。

languages.text: Der Inquisitor widmete seine gesamten Kraft dem Aufbau einer Geheimpolizei, die er nutzte, um die einflussreichsten Personen in der Ausdehnung heimlich zu kontrollieren. Er versetzte sämtliche Gouverneure und Lehnsherren in der gesamten Region in Angst und Schrecken. Mit der Zeit wurden Heinrix' Methoden immer extremer. Er verfiel dem Radikalismus und setzte die Werkzeuge von Xenos und selbst die des Chaos ein, um andere auszuspionieren und zu manipulieren. Eine gemeinsame Meuterei der imperialen Kriegsflotte und der Leute auf Footfall beendete seine Tyrannei. Entmachtet und in die Enge getrieben setzte der Ketzer jedoch verbotene Kräfte gegen seine Feinde ein und riss Hunderte von Unschuldigen mit sich ins Grab.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

traits.locale_text: Der Inquisitor widmete seine gesamten Kraft dem Aufbau einer Geheimpolizei, die er nutzte, um die einflussreichsten Personen in der Ausdehnung heimlich zu kontrollieren. Er versetzte sämtliche Gouverneure und Lehnsherren in der gesamten Region in Angst und Schrecken. Mit der Zeit wurden Heinrix' Methoden immer extremer. Er verfiel dem Radikalismus und setzte die Werkzeuge von Xenos und selbst die des Chaos ein, um andere auszuspionieren und zu manipulieren. Dier gemeinsame Meuterei der imperialen Kriegsflotte und der Leute auf Footfall beendete seine Tyrannei. Entmachtet und in die Enge getrieben setzte der Ketzer jedoch verbotene Kräfte gegen seine Feinde ein und riss Hunderte von Unschuldigen mit sich ins Grab.

languages.text: L'inquisiteur consacra toute son énergie à la création d'une police secrète qu'il employa pour contrôler clandestinement les personnages les plus influents des Étendues. Il terrifiait tous les gouverneurs et suzerains du secteur. Au fil du temps, les méthodes d'Heinrix se durcirent davantage. Versant dans le radicalisme, il utilisait des outils provenant des xénos et même du Chaos pour ses besognes d'espionnage et de manipulation. Une révolte alliant la Marine impériale à Castel mit fin à sa tyrannie, mais l'hérétique, défait et acculé, utilisa des pouvoirs interdits contre ses ennemis, emportant des centaines d'innocents dans la tombe.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

traits.locale_text: L'inquisiteur consacra toute son énergie à la création d'une police secrète qu'il employa pour contrôler clandestinement les personnages les plus influents des Étendues. Il terrifiait tous les gouverneurs et suzerains du secteur. Au fil du temps, les méthodes d'Heinrix se durcirent davantage. Versant dans le radicalisme, il utilisait des outils provenant des xénos et même du Chaos pour ses besognes d'espionnage et de manipulation. Une mutinerie alliant la Marine impériale à Castel mit fin à sa tyrannie, mais l'hérétique, défait et acculé, utilisa des pouvoirs interdits contre ses ennemis, emportant des centaines d'innocents dans la tombe.

languages.text: El Inquisidor dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a la creación de una policía secreta que empleó para controlar de forma clandestina a las figuras más influyentes de la Extensión. Ningún gobernador ni señor de la región estaba a salvo de ella. Con el tiempo, los métodos de Heinrix se volvieron más extremos. Sumiéndose en el radicalismo, recurrió a herramientas xenos e incluso del Caos para espiar a la gente y manipularla. El alzamiento conjunto de la Armada Imperial y de Paso puso fin a su tiranía, pero, derrotado y arrinconado, el hereje convocó poderes prohibidos contra sus enemigos, por lo que cientos de inocentes le acompañaron a la tumba.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

traits.locale_text: El Inquisidor dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a la creación de una policía secreta que empleó para controlar de forma clandestina a las figuras más influyentes de la Extensión. Ningún gobernador ni señor de la región estaba a salvo de ella. Con el tiempo, los métodos de Heinrix se volvieron más extremos. Sumiéndose en el radicalismo, recurrió a herramientas xenos e incluso del Caos para espiar a la gente y manipularla. El motín conjunto de la Armada Imperial y de Paso puso fin a su tiranía, pero, derrotado y arrinconado, el hereje convocó poderes prohibidos contra sus enemigos, por lo que cientos de inocentes le acompañaron a la tumba.

languages.text: 異端審問官は秘密警察の創設に全精力を注ぎ込み、それを使ってエクスパンスの有力者を秘密裏に統制した。彼はこの領域のすべての総督と家臣を恐怖に陥れた。時が経つにつれ、ハインリックスのやり方は過激さを増していった。過激主義に陥り、異種族や渾沌の力さえも使用して人々を監視し、操作するようになった。帝国海軍とフットフォールの共同蜂起により、ハインリックスの暴政は終わりを告げたが、追い詰められた異端者は禁断の力を敵に行使し、何百人もの罪のない人々を墓場へと連れ去った。
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

traits.locale_text: 異端審問官は秘密警察の創設に全精力を注ぎ込み、それを使ってエクスパンスの有力者を秘密裏に統制した。彼はこの領域のすべての総督と家臣を恐怖に陥れた。時が経つにつれ、ハインリックスのやり方は過激さを増していった。過激主義に陥り、ゼノや渾沌の力さえも使用して人々を監視し、操作するようになった。帝国海軍とフットフォールの反乱により、ハインリックスの暴政は終わりを告げたが、追い詰められた異端者は禁断の力を敵に行使し、何百人もの罪のない人々を墓場へと連れ去った。

languages.text: Engizisyoncu, tüm enerjisini gizli bir polis kuvvetinin yaratılmasına harcadı ve onları kullanarak Enginlik'teki en büyük nüfuz sahiplerini el altından kontrol etti. Bölgedeki tüm valilerin ve emîrlerin kalbine korku saldı. Zaman geçtikçe Heinrix'in metotları daha da aşırıya kaçmaya başladı. İyice radikalleşti, insanları gözetleyip manipüle etmek için zeno, hatta Kaos gereçlerini kullandı. Tiranlığı, İmparatorluk Donanması ve Binliman'da ortaklaşa gerçekleşen bir ayaklanma ile son bulsa da devrilen ve köşeye sıkışan kâfir, düşmanlarına karşı yasaklı güçler kullanarak kendisiyle beraber yüzlerce masumu da mezara taşıdı.
languages.original_text: The Inquisitor poured all his energy into the creation of a secret police, which he used to clandestinely control the most influential figures in the Expanse. He struck fear in every governor and liege in the region. As time passed, Heinrix's methods became more extreme. Descending into radicalism, he employed the tools of xenos and even Chaos to spy on people and manipulate them. A joint uprising by the Imperial Navy and Footfall put an end to his tyranny, and yet, cast down and cornered, the heretic brought forbidden powers to bear against his enemies, taking hundreds of innocents with him to the grave.

traits.locale_text: Engizisyoncu, tüm enerjisini gizli bir polis gücünün yaratılmasına harcadı ve onları kullanarak Enginlik'teki en nüfuz sahibi kişileri el altından kontrol etti. Bölgedeki tüm valilerin ve emîrlerin kalbine korku saldı. Zaman geçtikçe Heirnix'in metotları daha da aşırıya kaçmaya başladı. İyice radikalleşip, insanları gözetleyip manipüle etmek için zeno, hatta Kaos gereçlerini kullandı. Tiranlığı, İmparatorluk Donanması ve Binliman'da ortaklaşa gerçekleşen bir ayaklanma ile son buldu ancak devrilen ve köşeye sıkışan kâfir, düşmanlarına karşı yasaklı güçler kullanarak, kendisiyle beraber yüzlerce masumu da mezara taşımış oldu.
